job.title: Data Scientist - Entry Level
job.description: ltstronggtjob detailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtnew ideas are all around us but only a few will change the world thats our focus at jpl we ask the biggest questions then search the universe for answersliterally we build upon ideas that have guided generations then share our discoveries to inspire generations to come your missionyour opportunityis to seek out the answers that bring us one step closer if youre driven to discover create and inspire something that lasts a lifetime and beyond youre ready for jplltbrgtltbrgtlocated in pasadena california jpl has a campuslike environment situated on acres in the foothills of the san gabriel mountains and offers a work environment unlike any other we inspire passion foster innovation build collaboration and reward excellenceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtare you intrigued about artificial intelligence and autonomous systemsltbrgtltbrgtbe part of the team leading the development of innovative space technologies such as selfpiloting and onboard science processing systemsltbrgtltbrgtthe artificial intelligence group works on fundamental research problems leading to unique software applications in spacecraft autonomy scientific data analysis and mission operations automation and onboard analysis for realtime decisionsltbrgtltbrgtdevelopment projects will include automation of ground and flight operations for communications stations space missions marine vehicles aerial vehicles including fleets of vehiclesltbrgtltbrgtyou will use artificial intelligence technologies to partially and fully automate critical systems for scheduling planning and resource allocation you will support efforts in these areasltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtthis job will entail but is not limited toltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtdesign and develop complete components of software tools for data analyticsltligtltligtdevelop subsystem requirementsltligtltligtperform analysis on a wide variety of large and disparate datasets using complex techniquesltligtltligtdevelop scheduling algorithms for autonomous systems that must interpret large amounts of input state constraint and event data to generate actions and scheduled to achieve higher level goalsltligtltligtcommunicate results to internal customersltligtltligtapply and combine current and emerging techniques and tools in novel waysltligtltligtdevelop and combine complex data analysis techniques and methods for a specific applicationltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtqualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligttypically requires a bachelors degree in computer science or related discipline with a minimum of years of related experience masters degree in similar disciplines with a minimum of year of related experience or phd in similar disciplinesltligtltligtbroad knowledge in one or more related fields of the following areas software development artificial intelligence operations research resource allocation mechanisms quantitative modeling machine learning computer vision risk models and probabilistic methodsltligtltligtexperience in wide application of principles theories concepts and techniques in programming languages such as c c python java and artificial intelligence techniques and conceptsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtpreferred qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligthands on experience in automation and analysis systems for robotic autonomous systemsltligtltligtextensive knowledge of applicable industry andor academic practices and standards in software design ampamp development and computer scienceltligtltligtexperience in interdisciplinary team leadershipltligtltligtexperience in writing proposals task plans and research publications for peer reviewed forumsltbrgtltligtltulgtjpl is an equal opportunity employer all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex race color religion national origin citizenship ancestry age marital status physical or mental disability medical condition genetic information pregnancy or perceived pregnancy gender gender identity gender expression sexual orientation protected military or veteran status or any other characteristic or condition protected by federal state or local lawltbrgtltbrgtin addition jpl is a vevraa federal contractorltbrgtltbrgteeo is the lawltbrgtltbrgteeo is the law supplementltbrgtltbrgtpay transparency nondiscrimination provisionltbrgtltbrgtthe jet propulsion laboratory is a federal facility due to rules imposed by nasa jpl will not accept applications from citizens of designated countries or those
